Convection.name: Convection
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 2%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 4%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 6%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 8%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 10%.

Concussion.name: Concussion
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 1%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 2%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 3%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 4%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 5%.

Earth's Grasp.name: Earth's Grasp
descriptions: Increases the radius of your Earthbind Totem by 25%, and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 1 sec.
Increases the radius of your Earthbind Totem by 50%, and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 2 sec.

Elemental Warding.name: Elemental Warding
descriptions: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 5%, and increases your spell damage by 10% of your healing power.
Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 10%, and increases your spell damage by 20% of your healing power.
Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 15%, and increases your spell damage by 30% of your healing power.

Call of Flame.name: Call of Flame
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 30%.

Elemental Focus.name: Elemental Focus
descriptions: The Shaman enters a Clearcasting state after landing a direct critical strike with any spell. The Clearcasting state allows your mana to continue regenerating while casting, and increases your spirit-based regeneration by 400%.

Reverberation.name: Reverberation
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 0.25 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 0.75 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 1 sec.

Call of Thunder.name: Call of Thunder
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 6%.

Wrathful Totems.name: Wrathful Totems
descriptions: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1 seconds, reduces the attack time of your Searing totem by 0.5, and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 50%.
Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 2 seconds, reduces the attack time of your Searing totem by 1, and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 100%.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
descriptions: Gives you a 33% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 5 seconds after being damaged.  The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage. Cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Gives you a 66% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 5 seconds after being damaged.  The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage. Cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Gives you a 100% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 5 seconds after being damaged.  The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage. Cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Elemental Devastation.name: Elemental Devastation
descriptions:
Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 3% for 10 seconds, and your offensive melee crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 3% for 10 seconds.

Only one of these effects can be active at a time.

Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 6% for 10 seconds, and your offensive melee crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 6% for 10 seconds.

Only one of these effects can be active at a time.

Storm Reach.name: Storm Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Shock spells by 5 yards.
Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Shock spells by 10 yards.

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
descriptions: Causes the earth to quake and tremble, interrupting and disabling all enemies within 18 yards for 4 seconds. While disabled, all melee attacks and spells are guaranteed to critically strike.

Lightning Mastery.name: Lightning Mastery
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.2 sec, and reduces the threat caused by these spells by 6%.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.4 sec, and reduces the threat caused by these spells by 12%.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.6 sec, and reduces the threat caused by these spells by 18%.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.8 sec, and reduces the threat caused by these spells by 24%.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 1 sec, and reduces the threat caused by these spells by 30%.

Elemental Fury.name: Elemental Fury
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

Overload.name: Overload
descriptions: Your damaging Lightning Bolts have a 25% chance to grant you an Overload charge, increasing the number of targets affected by Chain Lightning by 1 and the damage multiplier by 25%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Your damaging Lightning Bolts have a 50% chance to grant you an Overload charge, increasing the number of targets affected by Chain Lightning by 1 and the damage multiplier by 25%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Your damaging Lightning Bolts have a 75% chance to grant you an Overload charge, increasing the number of targets affected by Chain Lightning by 1 and the damage multiplier by 25%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Your damaging Lightning Bolts have a 100% chance to grant you an Overload charge, increasing the number of targets affected by Chain Lightning by 1 and the damage multiplier by 25%. Stacks up to 3 times.
